welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Loyola Heights, Philippines! This quaint city is known for its vibrant culture, delicious food, and breathtaking views. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal in Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal in the airport, serving both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it primarily serves domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a limit of 2 hours per device per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
